Christie Page, Ward 4
=====================

**817.296.4677**

[Email Christie Page](mailto:cjmalcorn@gmail.com)

Term Currently Serving
----------------------

August 2017 – November 2028

[Map of Ward 4](https://texarkanatexas.gov/DocumentCenter/View/9530/Ward-4--Map-Redistricting-2022)
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Education
---------

Texas A & M University – Masters of Science/Curriculum & Instruction (2012)  
Texas A & M University - Bachelors of General Studies/Psychology (1998)

Professional Achievement
------------------------

Texas Public School Teacher (15 years)  
TISD – Department Chair of Special Education (Special Populations) (2009 - present)  
Fort Worth Can Academy (2006 – 2009)  
McKinney ISD (2001 – 2004)

Personal Information
--------------------

Christie has a son named Cameron and a daughter named Katie.
